name: webcore_ttl_multiplier
description: The value selected is used to multiply the max-age value for the cache-control on Webcore

values.description: Multiplies the max-age by one third for Webcore (max-age * 1/3)
Multiplies the max-age by two thirds for Webcore (max-age * 2/3)
The max-age remains unchanged
Multiplies the max-age by six for Webcore (max-age * 6)
Multiplies the max-age by twelve for Webcore (max-age * 12)
Multiplies the max-age by twenty-four for Webcore (max-age * 24)

name: non_webcore_ttl_multiplier
description: The value selected is used to multiply the max-age value for the cache-control on non-Webcore

values.description: Multiplies the max-age by half for non-Webcore (max-age * 0.5)
Multiplies the max-age by three quarters for non-Webcore (max-age * 0.75)
The max-age remains unchanged
Multiplies the max-age by two for non-Webcore (max-age * 2)
Multiplies the max-age by four for non-Webcore (max-age * 4)
Multiplies the max-age by six for non-Webcore (max-age * 6)
